title: Office Project 2003 Pro Portable SP2 - The11thMtnDiv
description:

-		  <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/user/the11thmtndiv/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/user/the11thmtndiv/</a>			    -

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



__________
FILENAMES:

 - do NOT ever rename the file "_Microsoft Office 2003 ThinApp - do not rename_.dat."

 - this DAT is what contains all of the programs - the other files are just shorcuts.

 - if the DAT file is renamed none of the programs will work until it's changed back.

 - since the rest of the filenames are just shorcuts, you can edit them all you want.


________________________________
THE TEMP FOLDER AKA THE SANDBOX:

 - do NOT delete the contents of the directory "temp folder(sandbox) - do not delete"

 - this folder's contents retain any changes made to the portable program's settings.

 - if you do accidentally delete this folder, it's ok because it will be regenerated.

 - if the program ever stop working correctly, then go and delete it or its contents.

 - since deleting the folder or its contents will revert the program to its original
settings, if it is important to you to never have to reconfigure your settings, make
sure to export your config with the "Microsoft Office 2003 Save My Settings Wizard."




ENJOY
-The11thMtnDiv
